sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) As a maneuver, the character may Brace himself. This allows a character to remove one setback dice per rank of Brace from the next skill check based on changing conditions, inclement weather, unstable surfaces, zero gravity, heavy gravity, or other disruptive physical obstacles that would make a skill check more difficult.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Brace</name> <number>TAL0001162</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:40:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d886a8d62fbfd090e0f497eef699b6de</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-13 19:40:41</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
